org.lwjgl.ovr

Class OVRTexture

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.lwjgl.ovr.OVRTexture
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Pointer

    public final class OVRTexture
extends java.lang.Object
implements Pointer
    Contains platform-specific information about a texture. Aliases to one of ovrD3D11Texture or OVRGLTexture.
